code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import"./Podcast.css";import{podcastSection}from"../../portfolio";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import StyleContext from"../../contexts/StyleContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Podcast(){const{isDark}=useContext(StyleContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:1000,distance:"20px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"podcast-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"podcast-header-title",children:podcastSection.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isDark?"dark-mode podcast-header-subtitle":"subTitle podcast-header-subtitle",children:podcastSection.subtitle})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"podcast-main-div",children:podcastSection.podcast.map(podcastLink=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{className:"podcast",src:podcastLink,frameborder:"0",scrolling:"no"})});})})]})});}
